branchCategory.name: Integrated Display
branchCategory.description: <p>Sensors with buttons and a display to set and read values from an operator's position.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 3 Screen 1 Output, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE20(F) is a digital vacuum sensor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.  ZSE20(F) saves energy with on 25mA current consumption.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Two sensing ranges include low vacuum and compound pressure, consisting of low vacuum and pressure.  ZSE20(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20A(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 3 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP40
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE20A(F) is a digital vacuum sensor with an informative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.  Compared to the ZSE20(F), the ZSE20A(F) adds a 2nd switch output, plus an analog voltage or current output.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Both vacuum and compound pressure ranges are offered.  ZSE20A(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20B(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 3 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE20B(F) is a digital pressure sensor with an infomative, easy to read 3 screen, 3 color display.  The main screen shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, while two sub-screens can display the setting label and its numeric value in orange.  Compared to the ZSE20(F), ZSE20B(F) adds a 2nd switch output, as well as an analog voltage or current output.  The switch output responds within 1.5ms once the set pressure value is reached.  Both vacuum and compound pressure ranges are offered.  ZSE20B(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE20B(F)-L, Digital Vacuum Sensor, 3 Screen IP65 with IO Link
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE20B(F)-L is a digital vacuum sensor with IO-Link communication protocol support.  When paired with an IO-Link master, measured values, and settings can be accessed from the HMI screen of a PLC.  ZSE20B(F)-L incorporates IO-Link version 1.1 and COM2 speed.  16-bit process data include 2 switch outputs, a diagnosis bit, and 13 bits for measured pressure value.  The 3-screen, 3-color display shows the instantaneous reading in red or green, and the setting label and its numerical value in orange.  ZSE20B(F)-L is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE10(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 1 Output with Analog, Compact
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE10(F) is a compact vacuum sensor suitable for mounting in panels or tight spaces.  This sensor has an integrated alphanumeric LED display with red and green LED switch indicators.  Switch delay time is 2.5ms, while current consumtion is 40mA.  Two sensing ranges are available, including low vacuum and compound pressure, consisting of low vacuum and pressure.  An auto-preset function helps optimize the switch setpoint.  ZSE10(F) meets UL/CSA, CE and RoHS standards, and has an IP40 enclosure rating.</p>

branchItem.name: ZSE40A(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 1 Screen 2 Output with Analog, IP65
branchItem.description: <p>ZSE40A(F) is a digital vacuum sensor with a 4 digit, 2 color display.  Instantaneous readings are shown in red or green, or shifted from one to the other to alert reaching a target condition.  Switch outputs are also indicated on the display.  Additional functions enhance security, power saving, resolution and stability.  Reduce effort and input errors by copying settings to up to 10 sensors.  Available M12 cable option.  ZSE40A(F) is UL/CSA, CE and RoHS compliant, with an IP65 enclosure rating.</p> <p><span style="color: #ff0000;">The ZSE40A(F) legacy pressure sensor has been updated.  Please consider the new ZSE20B(F).  Improved features include a new 3-screen, 3-color display and 2 switch outputs plus analog output.</span></p>

branchItem.name: ZSE40A, Digital Vacuum Sensor with M8 Connector, IP65
ZSE30A(F), Digital Vacuum Sensor, 1 Screen 1 Output with Analog, IP40
ISE30A/ZSE30A Panel Mount Adapter, Front Protection Cover
branchItem.description: <p>Based on our successful ZSE/ISE 30 Series, our new high precision digital pressure switch, Series ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A, with dual color display, offers even more high performance features. Now available with either NPN or PNP dual open collector outputs, or with the addition of an additional analog output (voltage or current), the sensors improved copy function also allows you to simultaneously set up to 10 switch&nbsp;monitors while setting the base.&nbsp; With a simple to follow three step setting process and the addition of a password setting function, potential errors, lengthy setting time and unwanted manipulation are kept to an absolute minimum. Further features of the CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A include a&nbsp; power saving function, which reduces energy consumption by up to 20%,&nbsp; various piping options and direct or panel mounting capabilities.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A Lead Wire with Connector
branchItem.description: <p>Based on our successful ZSE/ISE 30 Series, our new high precision digital pressure switch, Series ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A, with dual color display, offers even more high performance features. Further features of the CE, UL/CSA and RoHS compliant ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A include a&nbsp; power saving function, which reduces energy consumption by up to 20%,&nbsp; various piping options and direct or panel mounting capabilities.</p>

branchItem.name: ISE30A/ZSE30A One-Touch Fitting
branchItem.description: <p>Based on our successful ZSE/ISE 30 Series, our new high precision digital pressure switch, Series ZSE30 A(F) / ISE30A, with dual color display, offers even more high performance features. Now available with either NPN or PNP dual open collector outputs, or with the addition of an additional analog output (voltage or current), the sensors improved copy function also allows you to simultaneously set up to 10&nbsp;switch&nbsp;monitors while setting the&nbsp;base.&nbsp; With a simple to follow three step setting process and the addition of a password setting function, potential errors, lengthy setting time and unwanted manipulation are kept to an absolute minimum.
